name: youthful
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having the qualities that are typical of young people: At the time I admired his youthful enthusiasm. She has very youthful skin.
young: A youthful president can be good for a country's morale.

characteristic of young people, or relating to the period of life when you are young: Her youthful enthusiasm always makes her seem ageless. youthfulness noun [ U ] us
